field.label: Enable Plugin
field.help: Enable or disable the AbuseIPDB Checker plugin.

field.label: Check Frequency (days)
field.help: Number of days to wait before rechecking an IP address.

field.label: Abuse Score Threshold
field.help: Minimum confidence score (1-100) to consider an IP a potential threat.

field.label: Daily Check Limit
field.help: Maximum number of IPs to check per day.

field.label: Ignore Blocked Connections
field.help: When enabled, only monitor allowed connections and ignore blocked traffic.

field.label: LAN Subnets
field.help: Comma-separated list of LAN subnets to monitor in CIDR notation (e.g., 192.168.0.0/16,10.0.0.0/8).

field.label: Ignore Protocols
field.help: Comma-separated list of protocols to ignore (e.g., icmp,igmp).

field.label: API Key
field.help: Your AbuseIPDB API key. Sign up at https://www.abuseipdb.com/ to get one.

field.label: Max Age (days)
field.help: Maximum age in days for IP reports to consider.

field.label: Enable Email Notifications
field.help: Enable or disable email notifications for potential threats.

field.label: SMTP Server
field.help: SMTP server address for sending email notifications.

field.label: Use TLS
field.help: Enable TLS encryption for SMTP communication.
